text: Of course one can‚Äôt condone the (alleged) behaviour of Oxfam staff in Haiti and elsewhere. But I do wonder how hard it must be to sustain ‚Äúcivilised‚Äù values in a disaster zone. And overall I still respect those who go in to help out, where most of us wd not tread.
